Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with residual delays after to an unauthorized person on the tracks at 47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays after to an unauthorized person on the tracks at 47th. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Also, shuttle buses are available from Roosevelt to 95th/Dan Ryan, in both directions, to provide connecting service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
